parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Path to the file or folder to read

parameter.name: filePattern
parameter.description: File pattern to match when choosing files to read

parameter.name: startLineNum
parameter.description: Read file starting from this line

parameter.name: endLineNum
parameter.description: Read file up to this line

parameter.name: contentType
parameter.description: MIME type of the message generated

parameter.name: includeResultTo
parameter.description: Specify where to place operation result.

parameter.name: resultPropertyName
parameter.description: Name of property to add operation result.

parameter.name: enableStreaming
parameter.description: Read the file in streaming manner. No message interpretation

parameter.name: enableLock
parameter.description: Whether to lock the file when reading
